scripts.package:all: cross-env gulp package --use_platform pad && gulp package --use_platform fold && gulp package --use_platform pad --is_transplant true && gulp package --use_platform pad --use_ratio 3:2
scripts.package-ext:all: cross-env gulp package --use_platform pad && gulp package --use_platform pad --use_ext true && gulp package --use_platform fold && gulp package --use_platform fold --use_ext true && gulp package --use_platform pad --is_transplant true && gulp package --use_platform pad --is_transplant true --use_ext true && gulp package --use_platform pad --use_ratio 3:2 && gulp package --use_platform pad --use_ext true --use_ratio 3:2
scripts.build-ext:transplant: cross-env gulp build --use_platform pad --is_transplant true --use_ext true
scripts.release-ext:transplant: cross-env gulp release --use_platform pad --is_transplant true --use_ext true
scripts.package-ext:transplant: cross-env gulp package --use_platform pad --is_transplant true --use_ext true
scripts.build-ext:pad-ratio=3:2: cross-env gulp build --use_platform pad --is_transplant true --use_ext true --use_ratio 3:2
